trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is a problem communicating with the security token service.
trans-unit.target: 与安全令牌服务通信时遇到问题时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The problem can be caused by the following conditions: (1) Network failure (2) Failure to reach the MEX endpoint (3) Security token service does not have a valid endpoint identity
trans-unit.target: 问题可能由以下条件: （1） 网络故障 （2） 无法到达 MEX 终结点 （3） 安全令牌服务没有有效的终结点标识

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref> class.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should also be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容也应该是为用户所理解的。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>对象，其中包含有关所引发的异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
